text: Heartbroken to hear about the ongoing conflict in Ukraine. It's devastating to see innocent lives caught in the crossfire. 💔 As a passionate Liberal, I firmly believe in the power of diplomacy and peaceful resolution. It's high time world leaders step up and find a solution to protect human rights and restore peace in the region. 🌍 Let's come together, raise our voices, and demand an end to this senseless violence. 🕊️
